_sText: YES, thats its name, and why? Because this map was based in $2000$ CSS version by Calou, but this one was totally made by me, and I decided to keep the name style, ofc I had to change something so thats the name I chose. Not much to say, I just added the weapons in the end added a few more detail, and soundscapes when I finished, and this is the result. Credits go essencially to Calou, as he made the original map. Thanks everyone and I hope you like it.
